rule_text: The active player is the player taking a turn during the action phase.   4.1 During the action phase, the player who is first in initiative order is the first active player.   4.2 After the active player takes a turn, the next player in initiative order becomes the active player.   4.3 After the last player in initiative order takes a turn, the player who is first in initiative order becomes the active player again, and turns begin again in initiative order, ignoring any players who have already passed.
